display_long_description:
**Begin your epic adventure as you "Journey Up" towards the sky**

Begin your journey deep in a mine with no memories in your databanks or directives in your programming. The only thing you see is a glimmer of light far above you beneath a collapsed mine shaft.

Each jump and hand hold takes you closer to your goal. Explore different biomes and face different challenges as you journey up.

**Explore diverse biomes**
[media]


Each biome presents new sights and challenges on your way to the top.

**Single player or online multiplayer**
[media]

Whether playing offline on your own or online with upto 4 players you can be sure to have good latency with our cloud based servers.

**Physics based**
[media]

We model the whole body with our physics system so you can swing with your arms or slide things with your feet and push buttons by physically slapping them.

**2 Game modes**


Play on easy mode and you can respawn at your highest checkpoint

Play on hard mode to disable checkpoints and try for the fastest finish time.

**Leaderboards**


Compare individual zone times and whole game complete times with your friends on the leaderboards.

**Updates**

[New] Now with arm locomotion option
[media]

Whether adventuring solo or with up to 4 players online, keep journeying upwards... and don't look down!
